name: *caught inside*
description:
This game was developed as part of "Search For A Star 2021", a competition held by GradsInGames. The challenge I set myself out to do was to create a game that can be played from start to finish while learning Unity almost from the ground up in just a few weeks.

Project Documentation - Caught Inside.pdf contains the whole documentation of the project, including some dev diaries about the development of this game.
